response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is highly valued by its users and has exceptional features. Given its quality and benefits, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering all its merits, I'm offering it to you for $200. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value it can bring to you. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and needs.", "product_price": 200}
